LiveTerm: Build terminal styled websites in minutes

stories.text:
Hello,
Im interested in deploying a web app on a self-managed vps and am looking for good resources on the topic. I recall some older websites and articles written by founders who had set up scalable self-managed hosting solutions for their businesses, but I’d be darned if I couldn’t find them. If anyone has an inkling of what ever the hell I’m talking about, or has a line on any other nice resources that would be stellar. Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Classic Self-managed web app hosting  resources

stories.text:
Working at a startup that makes something genuinely useful, and it's selling like crazy. Growth is actually tied to revenue, go figure. At current valuation, my options are worth multiples of the strike price.

Would you exercise them?
